title: Heroin users aware of fentanyl, but at high risk of overdosing

title_detail.value: Heroin users aware of fentanyl, but at high risk of overdosing

summary: Most heroin users in Baltimore, a city heavily affected by the opioid epidemic, recognize that the heroin they buy is now almost always laced with the highly dangerous synthetic opioid fentanyl, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Most heroin users in Baltimore, a city heavily affected by the opioid epidemic, recognize that the heroin they buy is now almost always laced with the highly dangerous synthetic opioid fentanyl, according to a new study.
